alert.note: Alert for Box Elder; Davis; Tooele; Weber (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:20PM MDT until June 06 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WEBER...SOUTHERN BOX ELDER...NORTHWESTERN DAVIS AND NORTHERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 419 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles southeast of Montello to 18 miles north of Utah Test and Training Range North to 15 miles north of Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Hat Island, Lakeside, Lucin, Gunnison Island and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 19 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
